@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.js.SCarpenterC.name: SCarpenterComponent
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.js.SCarpenterC.description:
This component represent a carpenter UI that display some components/section/etc... and let you change their properties
on the fly to see how it behave

specs.description: Specify a url from where to get the carpenter data back, directly the JSON data or a simple id pointing to a HTMLTemplate tag that host the JSON data

adapter.description: Specify the adapter to use in order to apply the updated properties on a component/section/etc... Must be a registered adapter id

sidebar.description: Specify if you want the left sidebar to jump across all the components/sections/etc...

pagesLink.description: Specify the link to use to change page. You have access to the %dotpath token that will be replaced by the actual component/section specs dotpath

iframe.description: Specify if you want to put the page content inside an iframe to allow responsive resizing of your viewport. Can be either a boolean in which an iframe will be created automatically, or an iframe id to use

logo.description: Specify an image to be used as logo on top left of the interface

icons.description: Specify some icons html to be used across the UI

@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.node.SCarpente.name: SCarpenter
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.node.SCarpente.description:
This class allows you to use the display your components library as well as your sections, etc... in a
nice and easy interface that let you customize the props of your components live

loadspecs.name: loadSpecs
loadspecs.description: This method allows you to load the specs specified in the config.carpenter.sources configuration

start.name: start
start.description: This method allows you to start a server in order display your components library in a nice and coherent interface

@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.js.interface.S.name: SCarpenterComponentInterface
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.js.interface.S.description: This class represent the interface that describe parameters of the SCarpenterComponent

@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.node.interface.name: SCarpenterStartParamsInterface
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.node.interface.description:
This class represent the interface that describe the minimum requirement
needed to start a SCarpenter environment

port.description: Specify the server port you want for your carpenter environment

@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.re.name: Global reset
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.re.description:
These mixins allows you to apply some resets like `destyle` and/or the `sugar` one.
The `destyle` one is well known and you can find the documentation on their website.
The `sugar` one is our own that add some resets like setting max-width to 100% for images, and some more. Check our his own documentation page.

@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.re.name: Destyle reset
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.re.description: These mixins allows you to apply the `destyle` reset easily.

@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.re.name: Sugar reset
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.re.description: This mixin allows you to apply the `sugar` reset easily.

@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.ui.name: Icons
@coffeekraken.s-carpenter.sugar.style.ui.description:
These classes represent all the icons that you have listed in your project using the @sugar.icon.classes mixin.
By using this mixin, your icons will be accessible using the same s-icon:{name} classes
independently of the icon source that can be *Fontawesome** or your **Filesystem**.
These providers are the one that we support for now but others can be added if needed.

example.title: Used icons in this website
example.code:
github

Source: fab


question

Source: fa


folder

Source: fa


file

Source: fa
